metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13596 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Django 2.2 before 2.2.13 and 3.0 before 3.0.7. Query parameters generated by the Django admin ForeignKeyRawIdWidget were not properly URL encoded, leading to a possibility of an XSS attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-13596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.1').
